inclusion.criterion: Histological documentation of newly diagnosed malignant glioma
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: MRI showed a spinal cord conus mass which was biopsied and found to be anaplastic astrocytoma.

inclusion.criterion: Life expectancy of at least 12 weeks
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Spontaneous PT-INR/PTT < 1.5x upper limit of normal (patients on therapeutic anticoagulation will be allowed to participate)
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Prior treatment for high grade glioma
exclusion.label: triggers
exclusion.evidence: Patient has a history of anaplastic astrocytoma of the spine complicated by severe lower extremity weakness and urinary retention s/p radiation.

exclusion.criterion: Previous exposure to Ras pathway inhibitors
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Other concurrent active malignancy (with the exception of cervical carcinoma in situ or non melanoma carcinoma of the skin, superficial bladder tumor [Ta, Tis & T1] or any cancer curatively treated > 3 years prior to study entry)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Serious medical or psychiatric illness that would, in the opinion of the investigator, interfere with the prescribed treatment
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: History of HIV infection, chronic hepatitis C or B as well as clinically active infections (> grade 2 NCI-CTC version 3.0)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Evidence or history of bleeding diathesis
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient's life expectancy, hemoglobin level, granulocyte count, platelet count, SGOT, SGPT, alkaline phosphatase, serum creatinine, bilirubin, PT-INR/PTT, and corticosteroid dose are unknown.
